DOC.detailed_description: Evaluating the impact of 3 months daily zinc supplementation on incidence of severe and recurrent diarrhea in 6 to 36 months age children in Bandarabbaas in 2009
DOC.criteria: All 6 to 36 months old children without diarrhea at the time of study and without disease such as celiac Inflammatory bowl disease and hypersensitivity to milk Diarrhea at the time of the study and background disease such as celiac, IBD or hypersensitivity to milk
